title: Have you read Sigmund Freud's book Autobiography and Study about dreams? I'm presently reading it and I really love its theories. - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no book by Freud called “Study about dreams” - there is The Interpretation of Dreams but is rarely read cover to cover, and is much more used as a reference or consultation handbook, as it is in fact a sort of “General Grammar of the Unconscious”. Also Freud never wrote an “Autobiography”, he wrote an “Autobiographic Study” together with “History of the Psychoanalytic Movement” in the early 1920s. Good you are reading Freud and enjoying! - it is a clear sign you are a non-idiot: the next natural step is to start your psychoanalytic treatment with a psychoanalyst (and in the meantime produce a neurotic suffering so a clinical demand may appear).
